name: ANORAK FESTIVE BUNDLE
description: Just in time for Christmas, this ANORAK bundle is the perfect present for all Anorak fans! This bundle includes hours of brilliant reading, colouring in and lovely things to make. This bundle contains the Vikings issue, the Inventions issue, the Sports issue and the Toys issue. (While stocks last!) If you bought these items separately it would cost you £24. This bundle is a mere £16. Oh yes! Items sent by Royal Mail within 24hours of order receipt. If you require a faster service, please email us here. Anorak Magazine is aimed at kids aged 6+.

name: Anorak 8 Issues SUBSCRIPTION
description: Would you like to subscribe to eight issues of our happy mag' for kids AND save tons of money AND get it delivered every quarter straight to your door AND receive happy goodies with issue one? YES! Then, all you need to do is subscribe. Eight issues means at least 8 million hours of doodling, reading, playing, enough to inspire little and big minds and fire up their imagination! Promised! Anorak Magazine is aimed at children aged 6 to 12 years old but is enjoyed by the whole family. So you tell us! Subscribe today & the first edition you will receive is ISSUE 30 MYTHS & TALES. For all USA/CANADA subscriptions, please click here for our North American shop where you can pay in dollars.

name: Anorak 4 Issues SUBSCRIPTION
description: Never miss an issue of Anorak ever again, get your issues before anyone else, save on cover price and get it delivered straight to your door: yes? YES! Then, all you need to do is subscribe. One year means four issues. Four issues full of creative activities, stories to read, games to play, enough to inspire little and big minds and fire up their imagination! Anorak Magazine is aimed at children aged 6 to 12 years old but enjoyed by the whole family. Use the drop-down menu to pick your region. If you would like us to send a subscription to someone else, simply email us with the forwarding address. If you live in the UK and would prefer to pay by Direct Debit, please click here for our new Happy Rolling Scheme! For all USA/CANADA subscriptions, please click here for our North American shop where you can pay in dollars. Subscribe today & the first edition you will receive is ISSUE 30 MYTHS & TALES.

name: Gift Subscription Voucher.
description:
Otherwise known as the Happy Voucher!

Would you like to spoil someone and make them happy? It's simple: get them a subscription of our Happy Mag for Kids!

Here is how it works:
*This voucher entitles your lucky recipient to a 5 issue subscription.
*You can buy this voucher and get it sent with the latest issue of Anorak to your address. 
*Or you can buy the voucher and email us the address of the person you want to receive it. We will then forward it to them.
*Each voucher has an unique code which your lucky recipient will need to email us to validate their sub. 

Anorak Magazine is aimed at children aged 6 to 12 years old but enjoyed by the whole family. 

Use the drop-down menu to pick your region.

Subscribe today & the first edition your lucky recipient will receive is ISSUE 30 MYTHS & TALES.

name: The Big Book of Anorak
description:
2013 marks Anorak's seventh anniversary. SEVEN years!

To celebrate this momentous occasion, we are proud to announce the launch of The Big Book of Anorak. Anorak the annual! 

What can you expect to find in the The Big Book of Anorak? 

An unique and fun collection of beautifully illustrated stories, features, interviews, games and activities guaranteed to inspire and entertain any little ones aged 5+, all taken from Anorak's archives.
 
Fun stories such as“Leonardo The Shopping Tiger”, “Gary the lovelorn Giant”, humorous profiles like “Harrold the Hiccup”, “Louis the Knee” or “Sally the Smile”, colouring pages, mazes, word searches
and recipes (“Let’s Make Mr Happy Bread”) etc..etc.. 

 The Big Book of Anorak is the perfect present for anyone who enjoys silly fun, reading and drawing.

224 pages (we said BIG book of Anorak..) HARDBACK.

Sent in a cardboard book wrap and via Royal Mail.

name: Pam & Tom Colouring Book
description:
Pam & Tom are the best of friends who they get up to all sorts of mischief together. They first appeared in the toys edition of Anorak  and are now re-united in this charming new colouring book, entirely illustrated by Ben Javens.
Perfect for all colouring fans aged 3+.

A4. Landscape. Printed on recycled paper and using vegetable ink. 20pp.

Free UK postage.

name: Cosmic Patches
description:
This lovely patch will turn any drab jackets, jeans or bags into super cool cosmic items. Made by Adam Higton.

Sent within 48hours by Royal Mail. 2.5' x 2.5'.

name: Goober Activity Book
description:
Goober is a friendly goblin on a mission to have a fun adventure. He wants you to join him in his exhilarating journey through woods and toy shops. You will need to help him and his lovely buddies by counting, colouring in, doing dot to dot games and going through some pretty tricky mazes. 

Goober is a 36 pages activity book, written and drawn by Matt Bromley. It is suitable for kids aged 5+. Printed on recycled paper. 

Sent by Royal Mail First Class/Airmail. Free shipping to the UK.

name: Anorak  issue 30 - MYTHS AND TALES
description:
In this special anniversary issue, SEVEN YEARS, Anorak uncovers some of the most fascinating tales and myths from around the world. 

We discover why caves are cool, unearth some of the weirdest superstitions from around the world, and welcome the return of San, the three-eyed dog! This issue also contains games, mazes and plenty of colouring too! 

64 pages. Printed on offset recycled paper.

Anorak Magazine is aimed at kids aged 6+.

name: Anorak issue 29 - GAMES
description:
The summer is here so what better way to celebrate than PLAYING GAMES?! In this issue, there are GAMES, GAMES and more GAMES.
A bumper edition filled with mazes, games, activities that will keep everyone entertained during the summer holidays. 

Pre-order - delivery expected around 17th July.

68 pages. Printed on offset recycled paper. Free UK shipping.

name: Anorak issue 28 - WRITING
description: If there’s one thing that we are passionate about at Anorak, it’s WRITING! Without writing there’d be no Anorak, there’d be no magazines at all, or books, or letters, or emails or blogs. NIGHTMARE! Which is why this new issue of Anorak is dedicated to spreading the joy of the written word and encouraging you to give writing a go themselves. It celebrates diary writing, delves into how writing has shaped our history and even gives our readers a lesson in writing RUSSIAN!! In this issue, you will also meet the super hardworking Sally, who is a smile and the genius Eugene Furlong who invented the Cloud-o-mobile! Enjoy! 68 pages. Printed on offset recycled paper. Anorak Magazine is aimed at kids aged 6+. For the whole of JUNE, FREE shipping to the UK!

name: Anorak issue 27 - INVENTIONS
description: Our 27th issue is a celebration of all the wonderful inventors past and present who have made the world around us what it is today. And thanks to The Essential Anorak Inventing Manual, we reveal the top secret invention formula so you can start changing the world too! For up to the minute insider inventing tips there’s an interview with The Science Museum’s resident inventor Mark Champkins and award-winning inventor Dominic Wilcox proves that inventions aren’t just good ideas, they can be funny too! There’s also a giant helping of Anorak’s regular games, activities, recipes and beautifully illustrated stories. AND IT'S BIGGER! An extra 8 pages of printed fun, fun, fun! 68 pages. Printed on offset recycled paper. Anorak Magazine is aimed at kids aged 6+. For the whole of JUNE, FREE shipping to the UK!

name: Anorak issue 26 - ANIMALS
description: Isn't it truly fascinating to think that animals have roamed our beloved planet a lot longer than we have? I am thinking of the humble fly for example. It has been around for 65 million years! That's a loooong time! Which is why we are dedicating this issue to our favourite. Not favourite flies but favourite animals. The furry ones, the funny ones and even the weird ones, we worship them all! 64 pages. Printed on offset recycled paper. For the whole of JUNE, FREE shipping to the UK! Anorak Magazine is aimed at kids aged 6+.

name: Anorak issue 25 - CIRCUS
description: Roll up, roll up! The Anorak Circus is coming to town. It brings fun stories to read, exotic birds to colour in, a fabulous mini circus to make, profiles of some incredible artists such as The Strongest Man in the World, Zaz Zaz the Clown, Jackie the Trapezist and even the legendary PIG LADY! And much more. 64 pages. Printed on offset recycled paper. Anorak Magazine is aimed at kids aged 6+. For the whole of JUNE, FREE shipping to the UK!

name: Anorak issue 24 - HOLIDAY BUNDLE!
description: WOOHOO! Guess what’s making us so happy at Anorak Towers? It’s HOLIDAY TIME! We all know what that means: no homework. Lots of ice-cream. Free time to read books and build sandcastles. WOOHOO! It’s such a brilliant time of the year that we have decided to make an extra special edition of Anorak, a fifth edition! That’s not all. To top it off, this issue is in fact two issues in one, as it comes with a special GOOBER adventure activity book. WOOHOO again! Sent first class/by airmail within 48hours of order being made. 68 pages. Printed on recycled offset paper. Anorak Magazine is aimed at kids aged between 6 and 12 years old. For the whole of JUNE, FREE shipping to the UK!

name: Anorak issue 23 - SPORTS
description: Welcome to our 23rd issue, all dedicated to.... SPORTS. While we can’t guarantee you will keep fit as a result of reading this issue, we are pretty sure that it will inspire you to try sports you may not have previously thought of. Join our band of merry friends in our Happy Sports Village for much fun and some colouring in too. Printed on offset recycled paper with vegetable ink. Anorak is best suited to boys and girls aged 6+. For the whole of JUNE, FREE shipping to the UK!

name: Anorak issue 22- FOOD
description:
At Anorak we love food and this is what we are celebrating in this 22nd yummy issue. Food is fascinating because it has millions of possible combinations; some super yummy, some quite yukky. Join us in our journey to FOODWORLD, where Greedy Greg only eats a certain type of food, where we discover what food our ancestors ate and give you some tips to start loving the food we usually hate. 

ONLY 3 LEFT!!

FREE UK SHIPPING & HALF PRICE REST OF THE WORLD (£2.50 instead of £5).

name: Anorak issue 21 - TOYS
description: Welcome to Anorak’s 21st edition, which celebrates TOYS. Hooray! You will find inside a guide to the toys that make us go potty and an introduction to some of our favourite grown-ups who still go potty for toys. You will also find fun stuff to make like Super Crazy Eggbox Jellyfish, colouring pages, stories about a fashion-obsessed lion and a double-headed genie and much, much more! Sent first class/by airmail. 60 pages. Printed on recycled offset paper. For the whole of JUNE, FREE shipping to the UK! Anorak Magazine is aimed at kids aged between 6 and 12 years old.

name: Anorak issue 20 - HAPPY
description: Welcome to HAPPY Land, the land of Anorak! It's our fifth anniversary issue and to celebrate, we invited our little editors to write it all. It's packed with games, stories and colouring fun that hopefully will keep you HAPPY throughout the Autumn. 68 pages. Printed on recycled offset paper. Anorak Magazine is aimed at kids aged between 6 and 12 years old. For the whole of JUNE, FREE shipping to the UK!

name: Anorak issue 19 - SEA EXPLORERS
description: Captain Anorak Ol' Bucket here! Are you ready for adventures and mayhem? Good! You are setting sail on a voyage where you will hear riveting stories of lady pirates, fascinating Vikings and daring Tudor adventurers. All of that with the usual array of lovely colouring in pages and games. Plenty to keep little ones (and the whole family) entertained! Anorak Magazine is aimed at children aged between 6 and 12 years old. 64 pages printed on offset recycled paper and vegetable ink. For the whole of May, FREE shipping to the UK!

name: Anorak issue 18 - OUTDOORS
description: This issue, we are taking our happy readers in a magical land: the land of OUTSIDE. We are going to the beach to count sand particles (not really), in the city to ride our bikes, in the forest to build huts, in a field to do some cloud spotting and in the mountains to hug bears (not really). We also get top camping tips from the happiest camping family in the land! And if that's not enough, we have plenty of fun stories to read, enough colouring in to keep you busy for at least 4444 hours and games to do while lying on the beach or the grass outside! Anorak Magazine is aimed at children aged 7 to 12 years old but enjoyed by the whole family. For the whole of May, FREE shipping to the UK!

name: Anorak issue 15 - BIRDS
description: Our 15th issue celebrates our feathery friends: BIRDS. We were lucky enough to secure an interview not only with an owl expert from the RSPB, but also with the ever so busy Bob the Pigeon who tells us about pigeons in Roman times. This issue also hosts tons of wonderful bird-related colour-in pages and games. It carries stories, including one brilliant comic written by one of our little editors, Kizzy. FREE shipping to the UK!

name: PLOC Magazine  - THE FARM
description:
PLOC is the happy mag for little ones, exclusively illustrated by 60s French legend Alain Gree.

A happy magazine which contains tons of original games, stories to colour in and to read and plenty of fun facts to keep our friends' little brains ticking!
PLOC Magazine is about learning and having fun at the same time. It contains stories (How is bread made? What animals live at the farm? Learning to count with happy birds on a wire), colouring pages, spot the difference games, mazes and activities. All the artwork consists of original drawings by 60s French illustrator Alain Grée, whose work is timeless and delightfully happy. 

PLOC Magazine is the perfect reading companion for little ones and their parents, who are looking for a high quality, safe, advertising-free & educational magazine to feed their natural curiosity. 

Free shipping for UK and reduced for ROW.

52pages. 210 x 170mm. Soft cover. Printed on recycled offset paper.

name: PLOC Magazine  - SPORTS
description:
PLOC is back! This time, we celebrate SPORTS and sporting heroes. 

This new issue is packed with stories to read, games (how many ambulances can you count in that scene?), activities (growing a garden in an egg!) and colouring pages with Carioca, our pal the parrot.

All the artwork consists of original drawings by 60s French illustrator Alain Grée, whose work is timeless and delightfully happy.

PLOC Magazine is the perfect reading companion for little ones and their parents, who are looking for a high quality, safe, advertising-free & educational magazine to feed their natural curiosity.


52pages. 210 x 170mm. Soft cover. Printed on recycled offset paper.

Free UK Shipping and reduced for ROW.

name: Super Duper Heroes... Colouring Book
description:
Pixies, families, ladies, dogs and even smiley elephants are the Super Duper heroes gracing the pages of this crazy, bright and fun colouring book. And saving the planet of course! 
Illustrated by Melbourne based Magic Sweater, it is guaranteed to keep anyone aged 8+ entertained for hours!

A4. Printed on recycled paper. 20pp. FREE UK shipping.

name: Happy Colouring Bundle
description:
You like colouring in? This happy bundle of happy colouring books will keep all colouring in addicts extremely.. happy!

It includes four colouring booklets, picked at random between travel, cycling, words, happy and jungle!

Each book is 20 pages. One colour. A6 postcard format.

----------------------------------------------------------

Vous aimez colorier ? Ces petits cahiers de coloriage garantissent des heures et des heures de coloriages pour les addicts ! Et puis, en plus, vous apprendrez des mots anglais. 
Quatres petits cahiers dédiés à la musique, aux mots, au voyage et au vélo.

name: Colour Me Silly... Colouring Book.
description: This lush hardback colouring book is one for serious colouring addicts (like us). It's filled with fun doodles and monsters who need your help in applying a bit of colour to them. Makes the perfect travelling companion for long journeys. Illustrated by Jon Burgerman. COMES WITH A PACK OF STICKERS! Suitable for little people, medium sized people and big people. Approx 21x30cm / 8.3x11.8" Sent First Class Royal Mail. All photographs are by Stephanie Lynn. Please ask permission before using them by contacting cathy@anorakmagazine.com. Thank you.

name: Rosie Flo... Animals
description: Animals from every classification inspire Rosie Flo's fashion range of cats and dogs to spiders and even slugs. Colouring and activity book (by adding heads and limbs to the characters in the book) all in one. Printed in England on high quality FSC paper. Dimensions 20 x 20 cm. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail. All photographs are by Stephanie Lynn. Please ask permission before using them by contacting cathy@anorakmagazine.com. Thank you.

name: Happy Colouring Poster
description:
Illustrated by Grace Easton, this Anorak-inspired colouring poster created a bit of a stir when we had it blown up as a colouring wall at an event in the Spring! Legions of kids enjoyed colouring it in and many parents asked us where they could get one. So tada! 

If you get yours all finished and framed, please send us a picture of it, we would love to see them!

A2 size. Sent in a postal tube within 48hours of ordering.

name: Rosie Flo... Holiday
description: Join Rosie Flo as she travels the world. Her holiday adventures see her in fabulous outfits inspired by her destinations and experiences. Wearing a tasty fried egg and baked bean print round the campfire, looking cool in an igloo skirt amongst her polar friends and twirling a fork of spaghetti in her fusilli frock. Colouring and activity book (by adding heads and limbs to the characters in the book) all in one. Printed in England on high quality FSC paper. Dimensions 20 x 20 cm. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail. All photographs are by Stephanie Lynn. Please ask permission before using them by contacting cathy@anorakmagazine.com. Thank you.

name: Rosie Flo... Arty
description: This Arty book takes you on a visit to the world's most renowned galleries and invites you to create some of the world’s best-loved art. Take your place at da Vinci’s Last Supper, step into Vermeer’s studio or watch the ballet with Degas. Help Dali’s clocks to melt and Picasso’s harlequin to dance. Colouring and activity book (by adding heads and limbs to the characters in the book) all in one. Printed in England on high quality FSC paper. Dimensions 20 x 20 cm. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail. All photographs are by Stephanie Lynn. Please ask permission before using them by contacting cathy@anorakmagazine.com. Thank you.

name: Rosie Flo... Games
description: With a shiny silver touch to the cover, this bright red book is filled with dresses inspired by games. Indoor favourites of dominos, yo yos and chess or outdoor wheelbarrow racing and a teddy bears picnic will give hours of fun to all games fans! Colouring and activity book (by adding heads and limbs to the characters in the book) all in one. Printed in England on high quality FSC paper. Dimensions 20 x 20 cm. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail. All photographs are by Stephanie Lynn. Please ask permission before using them by contacting cathy@anorakmagazine.com. Thank you.

name: Myths & Tales Print.
description:
We are super proud to be the exclusive purveyors of this cute and dinky paper collage print by Adam Higton, called Myths & Tales. Perfect to inspire all little mystical dreamers, it is dedicated to the characters we love the most when reading a good ol'fashioned tale.

Size: 7' x 7'
Comes unframed.

name: Elves poster
description:
Lovely poster from 60s legendary artist Alain Grée. 

A3 print on 170gsm recycled offset paper.
Comes unframed. Sent in a postal tube.

All items are shipped within 48hours and take about two working days to reach anyone in the UK, up to five days for Europe and seven days for Rest of the World.

-----------------------------------------------------------

Les lutins dans la forêt égayeront les murs de vos chambres et des chambres de vos petits. Par Alain Grée.

name: London poster
description:
Let's celebrate Anorak's city of birth with its famous landmarks and people thanks to this beautiful, beautiful print from Marcus Oakley. 

50x70cm. Printed on 120gsm semi-glossy paper. Sent in a thick postal tube via Royal Mail by airmail and First Class.

-----------------------------------------------------------

La ville de naissance d'Anorak dans toute sa splendeur, grace au talent de Mr Marcus Oakley.

name: Rosie Flo... Underground House Poster
description: Subterranean fun for all. Rosie Flo shares her underground home with tea drinking badgers and little playful rabbits. She whizzes around in a motorized mole car and watches TV in a ball pool of giant acorns. Another imaginative house poster for children to colour and make their own. Printed in England on high quality FSC paper. Dimensions 20 x 20 cm. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail. All photographs are by Stephanie Lynn. Please ask permission before using them by contacting cathy@anorakmagazine.com. Thank you.

name: Rosie Flo... Johnny Joe's poster
description: A tree growing right through the house provides a drumkit room, a net for a game of badminton and a stairway down to a pool filling the whole ground floor. Welcome to Johnny Joe's house of fun! Printed in England on high quality FSC paper. Dimensions 20 x 20 cm. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail. All photographs are by Stephanie Lynn. Please ask permission before using them by contacting cathy@anorakmagazine.com. Thank you.

name: Happy Activity Book Volume Two
description:
What will you find in Anorak's Happy Activity Book Volume Two?

Spot the difference games, mazes, colouring pages and tons more superbly illustrated by our very talented and happy drawing friends.


FREE POSTAGE FOR UK.
36 pages. 300gsm cover and 180gsm body. 
210 x 170mm. Soft cover. Printed on recycled offset paper.
Cover by Simon Peplow. 
Art directed by Lewis Smith.

name: Snowfall Kingdom comic
description:
A psychedelic comic telling the tales of woodland folk, by Adam Higton. Each gorgeous drawing has a little story to tell but it's up to you to unearth it.
Makes the perfect picture book companion for little minds bursting with imagination and can be used as a colouring book too.

16 pages, b&w on 160 gsm Ivory paper.

name: My Happy Scrapbook
description:
At Anorak, we love scrapbooking. This 'gigantissimo' scrapbook will keep all budding collage artists nicely entertained. Stick pictures of your favourite people, your favourite animals, your hobbies, something gross and something funny.

Designed by dandy drawer Rob Flowers. A3 format. (That means really giant, like a poster giant). 16 pages.

Suitable for children 3+ provided they can hold rounded scissors in their hands!

FREE postage for all.

name: A trip to the bottom of the world
description: There’s so much to see at the bottom of the world! Join a young explorer and his best friend, Mouse, on a sea journey to Antarctica, where they make new friends with penguins and a whale — and have all kinds of fun. Young readers won’t stop grinning as they’re swept away by the strange and magical world created by Frank Viva, the bestselling author of Along a Long Road, and they’ll want to start the book again as soon as they reach the end! Toon Books are beautifully produced and illustrated comic books for younger readers. We can't get enough of them at Anorak and are very proud to include them in our shop. For children aged 4+. 32 pages. Hardback. Sent First Class Airmail with Royal Mail. All photographs are by Stephanie Lynn. Please ask permission before using them by contacting cathy@anorakmagazine.com. Thank you.

name: Silly Lilly
description: No job is too tough for Silly Lilly: first she's a cook who paints, then an acrobat who tumbles, then a vampire. Agnes Rosenstiehl's spunky heroine, one of France's most beloved children's book characters, takes on a new role every day of the week. Lilly's unstoppable antics are bound to spark young readers' imaginations. Toon Books are beautifully produced and illustrated comic books for younger readers. We can't get enough of them at Anorak and are very proud to include them in our shop. For children aged 4+. 32 pages. Hardback. Sent First Class Airmail with Royal Mail. All photographs are by Stephanie Lynn. Please ask permission before using them by contacting cathy@anorakmagazine.com. Thank you.

name: Maya makes a mess
description: In the midst of a family dinner with her scolding parents, Maya receives an unexpected invitation to dine with the Queen. Suddenly, her messy manners are put to the ultimate test and she begins to improvise her very own set of rules, with uproarious results. Toon Books are beautifully produced and illustrated comic books for younger readers. We can't get enough of them at Anorak and are very proud to include them in our shop. For children aged 4+. 32 pages. Hardback. Sent First Class Airmail with Royal Mail. All photographs are by Stephanie Lynn. Please ask permission before using them by contacting cathy@anorakmagazine.com. Thank you.

name: Anorak FRENCH - AMITIE
description: Bienvenue dans le monde d'Anorak, le mag' marrant pour enfants. Dans cette première édition, vous y trouverez des contes (marrants), des poissons (marrants), une maison faite en morceaux d'assiette, une chouette qui parle et un bateau en papier qui rêve... Mais ce n'est pas tout. Il y aussi des jeux, du coloriage et des contributions superbes de nos p'tits rédacteurs. "Un univers graphique foutraque et coloré conçu par des graphistes probablement élevés au psychédélisme." Je suis papa - blog.

name: Anorak FRENCH - BLAGUES
description:
Ha ha ha.
Ho ho ho.
Hi hi hi.
Mais qu’est-ce-que nous aimons rire à Anorak ! On ne s’appelle pas ‘le mag marrant pour enfants’ pour rien !
C’est donc dans la bonne humeur que nous vous accueillons pour notre deuxième numéro, entièrement dédié aux blagues. Nous espérons que cette édition vous fera rire et sourire pendant longtemps !  68 pages de bonheur sans AUCUNE publicité... OH YEAH!

Frais postaux sont GRATUITS dans le monde entier. Gatés ! 

"Anorak est sans doute le magazine le plus branché dans l’univers 5-9ans.” VOGUE (Enfants)

name: PLOC French - LA FERME
description: PLOC c'est le magazine joyeux pour les petits, illustré exclusivement par le légendaire artiste français Alain Grée. Un magazine joyeux d'une cinquantaine de pages qui contient un déluge de jeux originaux, d'histoires colorées et à colorier pour les apprentis lecteurs et des personnages toujours curieux de vivre des aventures amusantes. Avec PLOC, on s'éduque tout en s'amusant, en apprenant, par exemple comment le pain est fait ou quels animaux vivent à la ferme. Pour garçons et filles ages de moins de 8 ans. Et pour toute la famille aussi ! 52pages. 210 x 170mm. © 2011 Alain Grée et RicoBel

name: Mini Spring Day Notebook
description:
This tiny notebook is the perfect travelling companion for little minds with BIG thoughts.


Notebook containing 64 pages with half plain & half feint ruled lines for writing or drawing. Saddle wire stitch binding.

Size: 88mm x 125mm

name: Mini City Notebook - London
description:
Two cute mini notebooks in one set celebrating our hometown: London. Just as pretty on the outside as on the inside.


Staple binding notebooks containing 48 pages for writing or drawing. Made using 25% post-consumer recycled paper.

name: Good Morning Notebook
description:
What a beautiful day! This lovely notebook is for your happy thoughts only! If you think the front is pretty, have you checked the back?

A5 size of notebook containing 64 pages with 7mm feint ruled lines. Saddle wire stitch binding.

Size: 150mm x 210mm

name: Brown notebook
description:
This gorgeous brown notebook is the perfect book for all retro souls.

Size: 110mm x 155mm. 80 pages of feint ruled lines. Made from recycled materials.

name: Bateaux Mouches Notebook
description:
We love this pretty little notebook that celebrates the most iconic Parisian mode of transport.


Notebook containing 48 pages with feint ruled lines. Made using 25% post-consumer recycled paper. Saddle wire stitch binding.

name: London Tower Bridge Notebook
description:
We love this gorgeous little London notebook, which celebrates our city's most famous bridge. Ideal for recording our travel adventures.

48 pages with feint ruled lines. Made using 25% post-consumer recycled paper. Saddle wire stitch binding. Size 148mm x 180mm.

name: Cooter Boy Notebook
description:
Imagine Cooter Boy's adventures in this delightful notebook.

Notebook with 52 pages feint ruled lines.

Size 150mm x 210mm (A5)

name: Happy Chalk
description:
Is it an egg? Is it chalk? It's BOTH!
Easy to hold and reusable, these dustless,  washable chalks are sure to keep all creative ones happy. 
The chalk comes in pastel orange, red, blue, green, purple and yellow.
Chalk size approx. 6cm tall.

Size: 105mm x 155mm (Box)

name: Burgerdoodles Notebook
description: This doodling notebook will make you the champion of all doodlers! Fact. By Jon Burgerman. A6 in size. 120 pages, half lined and half plain. Strong hardback cover with bookmark and elastic binder. Sent First Class Royal Mail. All photographs are by Stephanie Lynn. Please ask permission before using them by contacting cathy@anorakmagazine.com. Thank you.

name: Woodlands notebook
description:
In these magical woods drawn by Marcus Oakley, a lion, a turtle, a snail and even an owl cohabit peacefully. This pocket notebook make the perfect travelling companion for little & big doodlers.


A6. 36pages. Recycled offset white paper. Stapled. 
Cover and inside covers illustrated with different scenes.
Free shipping if combined with another item.

==========================================
Dans ces bois magiques dessinés par Marcus Oakley, un lion, une tortue, un escargot et même un hibou cohabitent en paix. Ces petits carnets de poche sont les compagnons parfaits de voyage pour les petits et grands. Imprimé sur papier recyclé.

Frais postaux gratuits si achat combiné avec un autre produit.

name: London Travel Journal
description:
This pretty journal celebrates Anorak's hometown and is ready to be filled with the exciting things you are planning for your travels.

96 full colour illustrated. Size: 245mm x 205mm.

===========================================

Nous adorons ce journal de voyage qui celebre notre ville.
96 pages. Taille 245mm x 205mm. Imprimé  sur papier recyclé.

name: Football notebook.
description:
We can't promise this book will make you any better at football but it is a great place to record your goals!

Notebook with 52 pages feint ruled lines.

Size 150mm x 210mm (A5)

===========================================

Nous ne pouvons pas vous garantir que vous deviendrez Platini avec ce carnet de foot mais c'est l'endroit parfait pour y enregistrer vos victoires !

52 pages. Taille 150mm x 210mm

name: Le petit cahier
description:
Le Petit Cahier is a lovely lined booklet ready to collect your lists, thoughts, wishes and dreams.

60 pages. Lined. A6. Recycled offset beige paper. Stapled. 


===========================================
Le Petit Cahier est un joli carnet qui attend vos pensées, vos désirs et vos ré ves.

60 pages. A6. Imprimé sur papier recyclé.

name: Classroom journal.
description:
Record all your classroom antics in this lovely notebook. 

Notebook with 52 pages feint ruled lines.

Size 150mm x 210mm (A5)

=============================================

Journal de classe. 52 pages. Taille 150mm x 210mm

name: London Street
description:
We love this gorgeous little London notebook, which celebrates our city's ancient buildings. Ideal for recording our travel adventures.

48 pages with feint ruled lines. Made using 25% post-consumer recycled paper. Saddle wire stitch binding. Size 148mm x 180mm.

-----------------------------------------------------------

Que ce soit à Londres où Paris, ce petit carnet sera le parfait compagnon de voyage pour vos aventures en ville. 
48 pages.

name: We Love London Postcard Guide
description:
As you may know, London is our hometown. We love our city.
We Love London is our London postcard guide with our picks of the most exciting places to visit in London as a family.

It includes six beautifully illustrated postcards by Jay Wright, one for each area of London and features some of London’s most interesting landmarks and museums. 

Printed on recycled paper, this bundle of six cards is not just a guide but also doubles up as actual postcards that you can send to your friends and family.

Sent by Royal Mail, first class/ by airmail. FREE UK shipping.

name: Big Ben or Eiffel Tower.
description:
Are you more of a Big Ben or an Eiffel Tower type person? Maybe you are both. We can't decide.

Ideal for recording our travel adventures.

48 ruled pages. Size 12cm x 15cm.


----------------------------------------------------------

Nous adorons ces petits carnets qui célèbrent les endroits les plus iconiques de Paris ou Londres.
48pp. Ligné.

name: Squirrels, Birds or Owls?
description:
We fell in love with this Korean (but French-named) collection of notebooks: Le Cahier. This one is 64 pages and has delightful pencil drawn birds, owls or squirrels on the cover. 
With feint ruled lines.
Size 105mm x 145mm

Nous adorons cette collection de carnets qui, bien que venant de la Coree du Sud, s'appelle Le Cahier. 64 pages. Taille 105mm x 145mm

name: Ta Bom Yellow Notebook
description:
This mini notebook is for the little (and big) list-makers out there. Thumbs up, all done!

60 pages check list & memo. Size 100mm x 140mm

-------------------------------------------------------
Ce mini cahier jaune est parfait pour ceux qui aiment faire des listes. Un, deux, trois, c'est fait !

name: Gnomie badges
description:
These Gnomies badges are handmade by Caroline, our new craft-tastic friend. You won't find them anywhere else as they are exclusively available  in our Happy Shop. We are totally in love with her collection of delicately handmade pals and hope you will be too. All made using vintage fabric.

Because each of them is made by hand, they are all different so we will send you any one of them at random. That way, you get a nice surprise!

Sent by Royal Mail First Class & by airmail.

name: Little Trees badges
description:
These Little Trees badges are handmade by Caroline, our new craft-tastic friend. You won't find them anywhere else as they are exclusively available  in our Happy Shop. We are totally in love with her collection of delicately handmade pals and hope you will be too. All made using vintage fabric.

Because each of them is made by hand, they are all different so we will send you any one of them at random. That way, you get a nice surprise!

description:

Because each of them is made by hand, they are all different so we will send you any one of them at random. That way, you get a nice surprise!

Sent by Royal Mail First Class & by airmail.

name: Owl badges
description:
These lovely owl badges are handmade by Caroline, our new owl-tastic friend. You won't find them anywhere else as they are exclusively available  in our Happy Shop. We met Caroline at a market a few weeks back and fell in love with her collection of delicately handmade pals. All made using vintage fabric.


Because each of them is made by hand, they are all different so we will send you anyone of them at random. That way, you get a nice surprise!

name: Useless Purse
description:
These lovely but quite useless purses are handmade by Caroline, our new friend. You won't find them anywhere else as they are exclusively available  in our Happy Shop. 
We met Caroline at a market a few weeks back and fell in love with her collection of delicately handmade goodies. All made using vintage fabric.
Because each of them is different, we will send you any one of them at random. Nice to have a surprise, isn't it?!

name: Girl & Balloon Card
description:
Send someone a happy thought with this delightful card from our friends at Dicky Bird.
It is beautifully printed on a heavy matt paper stock and comes with a brown envelope.

It is blank inside so you can write your own message, whether it be for a birthday or just to say hello to someone!

Size 148 x 105mm. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail.

name: Elephant and Balloon Card
description:
Send someone a happy thought with this delightful card from our friends at Dicky Bird.
It is beautifully printed on a heavy matt paper stock and comes with a brown envelope.

It is blank inside so you can write your own message, whether it be for a birthday or just to say hello to someone!

Size 148 x 105mm. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail.

name: Happy Cats Card
description:
Happy Cats. We love Happy Cats. 
This gorgeous card from Dicky Bird is beautifully printed on a heavy matt paper stock and comes with a brown envelope.

It is blank inside so you can write your own message, whether it be for a birthday or just to say hello to someone nice!

Size 148 x 105mm. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail.

name: Out at Sea Card
description:
Off we go! Out at Sea! 

Beautifully printed on a heavy matt recycled paper stock and comes with an envelope. Illustration by Marc Boutavant.

120mm x 170mm folded.
Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail.

name: Teepee Girl Card
description: Teepee Girl says "Happy Birthday!" Beautifully printed on a heavy matt recycled paper stock and comes with an envelope. Illustration by Marc Boutavant. 120mm x 170mm folded. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail. All photographs are by Stephanie Lynn. Please ask permission before using them by contacting cathy@anorakmagazine.com. Thank you.

name: Cycling Rabbits Card
description:
Yes, of course rabbits know how to cycle!

Beautifully printed on a heavy matt recycled paper stock and comes with an envelope. Blank inside so you can add your own message.
 Illustration by Marc Boutavant.

120mm x 170mm folded.
Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail.

name: Russian Doll Card
description: We love this happy Matryoshka! Beautifully illustrated and printed card on a heavy matt paper stock. Comes with an envelope. Illustration by Ben Javens. It is blank inside so you can write your own message! Size 120mm x 170mm folded. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail. All photographs are by Stephanie Lynn. Please ask permission before using them by contacting cathy@anorakmagazine.com. Thank you.

name: Bike Girl Card
description: Ding-a-ling, time to hop on our bikes! Beautifully illustrated and printed card on a heavy matt paper stock. Comes with an envelope. Illustration by Ben Javens. It is blank inside so you can write your own message! Size 148 x 105mm. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail. All photographs are by Stephanie Lynn. Please ask permission before using them by contacting cathy@anorakmagazine.com. Thank you.

name: Bike Boy Card
description: Ding-a-ling, time to hop on our bikes! Beautifully illustrated and printed card on a heavy matt paper stock. Comes with an envelope. Illustration by Ben Javens. It is blank inside so you can write your own message! Size 120mm x 170mm folded. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail. All photographs are by Stephanie Lynn. Please ask permission before using them by contacting cathy@anorakmagazine.com. Thank you.

name: Flower Girl Card.
description:
Flower Girl is the bearer of nice messages only!
We love this gorgeous card from Dicky Bird, which is beautifully printed on a heavy matt paper stock and comes with a brown envelope.

It is blank inside so you can write your own message, whether it be for a birthday or just to say hello to someone nice!

Size 148 x 105mm. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail. 
===========================================

La 'dame-fleur' ne livre que des gentils messages de bonheur ! 

Nous adorons cette jolie carte de Dicky Bird, qui est imprimée sur du beau papier matt et recyclé. Fournie avec une envelope marron. Il n'y a pas de message à l'intérieur comme ça vous pouvez mettre le vôtre !

name: London Taxi Card.
description:

We love this gorgeous card from Dicky Bird, which is beautifully printed on a heavy matt paper stock and comes with a brown envelope.

It is blank inside so you can write your own message, whether it be for a birthday or just to say hello to someone nice!

Size 148 x 105mm. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail. 
===========================================

Partons en vacances avec ce taxi Londonien ! 
Nous adorons cette jolie carte de Dicky Bird, qui est imprimée sur du beau papier matt et recyclé. Fournie avec une envelope marron. Il n'y a pas de message à l'intérieur comme ça vous pouvez mettre le vôtre !

name: London Bus Card.
description:
This iconic hop-on hop-off London bus has some cute passengers on board! We love this gorgeous card from Dicky Bird, which is beautifully printed on a heavy matt paper stock and comes with a brown envelope.

It is blank inside so you can write your own message!

Size 148 x 105mm. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail. 
===========================================

Ce bus iconique de Londres accueille des passagers sympas ! Nous adorons cette jolie carte de Dicky Bird, qui est imprimée sur du beau papier matt et recyclé. Fournie avec une envelope marron. Il n'y a pas de message à l'intérieur comme ça vous pouvez mettre le vôtre !

name: Owl & Rainbow Card.
description:
Owls and rainbows: two of our favourite things! 
We love this gorgeous card from Dicky Bird, which is beautifully printed on a heavy matt paper stock and comes with a brown envelope.

It is blank inside so you can write your own message, whether it be for a birthday or just to say hello to someone nice!

Size 148 x 105mm. Sent First Class/Airmail Royal Mail.

Cette chouette qui vit dans un arc-en-ciel est prête à livrer votre message. 

Nous adorons cette jolie carte de Dicky Bird, qui est imprimée sur du beau papier matt et recyclé. Fournie avec une envelope marron. Il n'y a pas de message à l'intérieur comme ça vous pouvez mettre le vôtre !

name: Happy House poster
description:
Wonderful print from 60s legend Alain Grée.

A3 print recycled offset paper 170gsm.
Comes unframed. Sent in a postal tube.

All items are shipped within 48hours and take about two working days to reach anyone in the UK, up to five days for Europe and seven days for Rest of the World.

name: Garden poster
description:
Ah the joys of hanging out in a garden, a great place to chill! This lovely garden scene, drawn by Human Empire, is guaranteed to brighten all walls. Please note that this poster is a one long strip. See dimensions below.

Sent by Royal Mail in thick cardboard postal tube. Airmail/First Class.
Printed on Matt Recycled paper. (115 g / sqm). Size 85cm x 30 cm.

All items are shipped within 48hours and take about two working days to reach anyone in the UK, up to five days for Europe and seven days for Rest of the World.

name: Happy poster
description:
This happy poster celebrates happy words!

420mm x 594mm (that's A2), 170gsm giclee full colour and semi glossy poster, sent first class in a cardboard tube.

name: CIRCUS Poster
description:
Roll up roll up! Wonderful circus print by the equally amazing Graziela Priezer all complete with a cycling lion and a parrot weightlifter. Perfect for all kiddies' bedrooms but also for gazing at it for hours.

Size is 50 x 70cm. Comes unframed. Sent by Royal Mail in a cardboard tube.

name: Cagoule
description: Cagoule is definitely NOT FOR KIDS! Only for grown-ups! A happy mag for grown-ups. Poems, rants, comics, portraits, bad food, questions, bras, birds, lovely drawings: that's what you will find in Cagoule magazine. It's a bit serious at times and at other times, it's not at all. One thing we know for sure is that it's not like any other magazines out there. We hope you'll enjoy reading it as much we have enjoyed making it. That's a lot. It is beautifully designed and art directed by Supermundane and drawn by these amazing people: Mark Silipo, Jim Stoten, Tom Bingham, Andy Rementer, Jay Cover, Hattie Stewart, Nick White, William Edmonds, Nicholas Burrows, Sophie Kern, Eleanor Rudge, Joe Crocker, Kellie Strom, Matthew the horse Scott Balmer Jay Howell and Jay Wright Cagoule is 84 pages, printed on offset paper, except the cover has a gloss laminate on it (controversial!). All copies are numbered. Sent first class/by airmail.

name: No Quiet Place - Chief Seattl
description:
"There is no quiet place in the white man's cities. No place to hear the unfurling of leaves in spring, or the rustle of an insect's wings. But perhaps it is because I am a savage and do not understand. The clatter only seems to insult the ears."

These are the powerful words told by Chief Seattl, a Native American Indian, to the President of the United States in 1854. 300 years later, this incredibly moving speech about tolerance and our relationship to Nature is still relevant to the world we live in. 

A4 booklet. 16pp.

name: Idiot Stories and Extra Ordinary
description: “Manhattan is one hell of a city. I lived there in 1997 whilst on a placement with my university course. I worked in a museum where I shadowed a paleontologist called Ross.” A series of surreal and touching vignettes, written & illustrated by Matthew Hodson aka Matthew the Horse, called Idiot Stories. “They were expecting tears at the funeral, and they came, but only when her thoughts turned to her recently dead dog.” A collection of bittersweet, awkward, funny "Micro Dramas", written & designed by Supermundane. You don't even pay for postage. Nice. –––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– Product Information 2 x A6 20 pages one colour booklets. ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

name: Surprising Shakespeare
description:
"Love is blind and lovers cannot see."
This little fun booklet is a collection of anecdotes about our most famous playwright, William Shakespeare. We discover here that the most expensive folios by the bard fetched more than £4.1 million in an auction at Christies. 

A4 16pp booklet. Illustrated by Val Falla.
